name: mack-link
description: A personal URL shortener built with Cloudflare Workers and React

scripts.build: npm run build:management && npm run build:worker
scripts.deploy: npm run build && cd worker && npm run deploy
scripts.test:ci: npm run test && npm run validate:local
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd worker && npm install && cd ../management && npm install
scripts.clean: cd management && rm -rf dist node_modules && cd ../worker && rm -rf node_modules .wrangler && rm -f src/admin-assets.js
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint && echo 'All linting completed'
scripts.security:audit: npm audit --audit-level=moderate && cd worker && npm audit --audit-level=moderate && cd ../management && npm audit --audit-level=moderate
scripts.security:fix: npm audit fix && cd worker && npm audit fix && cd ../management && npm audit fix
scripts.maintenance: npm run security:audit && npm run test:ci && npm run validate:prod
scripts.ci:build: npm run install:all && npm run lint:all && npm run build
scripts.ci:test: npm run ci:build && npm run test:ci

author: SpyicyDev
